content: Hello, I need help with my account
Hi there! I'd be happy to help you with your account. What specific issue are you experiencing?
I understand you're having trouble logging in. Let me help you with that. Have you tried resetting your password?
Yes, but I didn't receive the reset email
I see. Let me check your email settings. Can you confirm the email address associated with your account?
Our business hours are Monday through Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM EST. How else can I assist you?
We offer limited weekend support through our online help center and chatbot. For urgent issues, you can reach our emergency line.
I want to cancel my subscription
I'm sorry to hear you want to cancel. May I ask what prompted this decision? We'd love to address any concerns you have.
I understand budget concerns. We actually have some more affordable plans that might work better for you. Would you like to hear about them?
Great! We have a basic plan at $9.99/month and a standard plan at $19.99/month. Both include core features. Which would you like to learn more about?
